string.value: 今天的餐点还真令人满意啊！谢谢你~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: 不要了！我已经吃不下了~

string.name: f2_s
string.value: 谢啦！我正觉得有点饿呢~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 你是想要这种方式，表达你对我的不满吗？真是幼稚啊~

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 好吃耶！营养均衡的餐点是很重要呢~

string.name: f4_f
string.value: 什么啊？又要我吃？你是不是脑筋不清楚啊？要不要去看医生？

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 嗯嗯~很好~必要营养素…还兼顾热量！不错不错~

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: 对我易如反掌~ 呜噜

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 哼…我不想做那种没意思的事情。呜噜…

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 主人,怎么样啊？不错吧？呜噜

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 如果是主人让我做的...呜噜...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 啊哈~ 个子变得很高。/ 个子高了

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 哎呀…你总让我做同样的事儿。

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 这样站起来，能看到好远的地方啊。

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 站来，现在对我来说是小菜一碟。

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: 在这么多的人面前怎么便便呢？呜~

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 现在不是嘘嘘时间啊。呜…

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 主人，你去卫生间便便吧...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 哈哈~ 哎哟！差点儿踩到。

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: 不想便便，你可以便便吗？

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: 因为早上什么都没吃，不会便便。

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 今天便便的样子好可爱。

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: 很舒服。哎呀！你踩便便了。

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 你看见过兔子说话的吗？

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: 现不是唠唠叨叨的时候。

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: 看起来有点累，没事儿吧？

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: 买东西的时候，你注意别被骗。

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: 如果我饿的话，马上去我家，别饿着我。

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 我最喜欢的一个词是我爱你呀。

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 别总在一样的地方跑来跑去。

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 只有一个人游戏，没意思。跟其他人亲密些会更好！

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 这岛里有许多人。你不要忘记关心别人。

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 我听说，在岛中央迷宫里有神殿。

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: 我没有说话。给我米饭吧。

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 现在有点儿困，等会儿再跟你说。

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 不怎么样，有没有更有意思的？

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 我们的宠物是叫射手村的科洛伊做的。

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 主人，脑袋这么大呀！哈哈！

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 虽然舍不得，但吃药水就会更强。

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 你解决任务的话，说不定有好事。

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: I do not wish to sit.

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I shall rest my wings now, so I can fly farther tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: 讨厌！两三天没洗澡了吧？

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 主人，你快点儿去洗澡，洗澡。

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: 主人，你想我依偎着你吗？

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: 在您的怀里感到很舒服啊。

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: 每天让我做同样的事儿...没有别的吗？呜？

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: 嗯？我在想别的事儿~ 呜~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: 这样坐下去会瞌睡的…呜~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 我哪里也不去，就坐在这里~ 呜~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 坐在这里就可以了吧？呜？

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 主人...你肯定有短舌吧？呜噜？

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 我不可以以后做吗？呜噜...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 主人，这样坐太容易了~ 呜~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 你每天都让我做这么容易的事儿吧~ 呜~！

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 好，主人！我坐了~ 呜噜~

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: 哼！这个人又无缘无故骂我……

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: 我什么也没做。你怎么了? 呜噜……

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: 你不要做出那么严肃的表情…呜噜～

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 主人！我哪里错了呀？呜噜…

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 像我这样这样温顺的宠物哪里有啊？呜噜…

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 我一动不动站着。什么也没做。

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that. I'm already seen with you.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: 怎么可能随随便便就说什么便便…

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: 这是什么话？现在应该不是谈论这个的时候吧！

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: 现在有点忙，那件事情…晚点再说！

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: 我最近深受便秘所苦，我的心情…你能了解吗？

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: 噗！还真不好意思啊…这年纪竟然还说什么便便...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: 我最近正好因便秘所苦，今天终于成功了~

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: 哪里有洗手间啊？我正在找…

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: 正有东西要出来…稍等一下！

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 今天风还满大的，要挥动翅膀还满吃力…

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: 好像有听到些什么…可怎么听不大懂呢？怪了~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 怎么可能随随便便就说什么便便…

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 这是什么话？现在应该不是谈论这个的时候吧！

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: 今天没用什么力，还挺顺利的~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 噗！还真不好意思啊…这年纪竟然还说什么便便…

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 神清气爽啊！排泄顺畅是很重要的~

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 现在有点忙，那件事情…晚点再说！

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: 你帮我买点便秘药吧！最近还真不够顺畅啊…

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 今天风还满大的，要挥动翅膀还满吃力…

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 我可不是随地大小便的无赖龙~

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 你能够了解这种通体舒畅的感觉吗？哈哈~

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 神清气爽啊！排泄顺畅是很重要的~

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 现在可以方便一下了吗？我刚好一直忍着呢~

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: 你这是在干什么，保持形象吧！

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: 今天真累...我得休息一下~

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: 是谁在吵吵闹闹的啊？吵到我无法集中精神~

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: 嗯~今天还没无聊没事做耶~

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: 我也爱你…这还挺害羞的~

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: 你现在才要表白啊！我还在等着呢~

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: 怎么突然说这种话...呵呵~其实我也爱你~

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: 只要有你在，我就很幸福~

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: 是谁在吵吵闹闹的啊？吵到我无法集中精神~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: 嗯…风声还满吵的…今天连辉动翅膀也很吃力耶~

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: 你这是在干什么，保持形象吧！

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: 现在有点忙...我们晚点再说~

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 只要有你在，我就很幸福~

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: 呵呵~你的心意，其实我都晓得啦！

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: 我也爱你…这还挺害羞的~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: 你现在才要表白啊！我还在等着呢~

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 今天真累...我得休息一下~

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 我说你到底是在说什么啊？说些我听得懂的话吧！

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 我超讨厌这种天气，今天还是少出门比较好…

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 你今天是不是没事做啊？没事那来帮我的忙吧！

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 怎么突然说这种话...呵呵~其实我也爱你~

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 只要有你在，我就很幸福~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 呵呵~你的心意，其实我都晓得啦！

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 你不说我也晓得…你对我的这份心意~呵呵~

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 老兄~你说些我听得懂的话好不好？这样要怎么对话啊！

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: 是谁在吵吵闹闹的啊？吵到我无法集中精神~

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: 今天真累...我得休息一下~

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 嗯~今天还没无聊没事做耶~

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: 嘎呜~你希望我对你说什么？

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 我想再去见迦尔努斯…你带我去见他！

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: 你竟然会听得懂我们龙族的话，你…不简单喔！

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: 我好想回到以前的样子，你能帮我吗？

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 今天风还满大的，要挥动翅膀还满吃力…

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 你是想跟我说什么？讲清楚一点~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: 你有说什么吗？似懂非懂的感觉耶~

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: 现在有点忙...我们晚点再说~

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: 其实我正因某件事情所苦恼…你今天愿意听我说吗？

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: 你竟然会听得懂我们龙族的话，你…不简单喔！

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 我想去见迦尔努斯…你带我去见他！

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 刚刚好像有什么声音耶~你有听到吗？

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 老兄~你说些我听得懂的话好不好？这样要怎么对话啊！

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 今天风还满大的，要挥动翅膀还满吃力…

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 好吵…安静点~我要集中精神~

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 这段时间我一直有在观察你喔！

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 嘎呜~你希望我对你说什么？

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 你竟然会听得懂我们龙族的话，你…不简单喔！

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 你有见过我的朋友吗？我好想见见我的同伴~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: 我说你怎么整天想要睡觉啊？

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 你有想清楚吗？在这么忙的时间竟然要我睡觉？

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 我好怀念迦尔努斯…他帮我了我不少忙…

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 别整天只想要睡觉，我们去别的地方吧！这里今天没什么人耶~

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 今天你也辛苦了~那晚安啰！

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 那我差不多要休息了~困~Zzz…

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: 嗯..我比较喜欢飞来飞去~

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: 我不要坐…难道还要告诉你原因吗？

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: 你要不要也来坐一下啊？休息也是很重要的修行呢！

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: 人类…你这人挺不错的嘛！

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: 为了飞更远的路，确实需要休息一下~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 我好怀念迦尔努斯…他帮我了我不少忙…

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 现在正忙呢~你怎么会想要睡觉？

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 想睡你自己睡吧！我不困~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 那我差不多要休息了~困~Zzz…

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 你这人怎么这么懒散？竟想着要睡觉~

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 你想到哪里去了？竟然现在就要睡？

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: 有没有搞错啊？现在正忙着呢~

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 今天天气这么好…差不多要去打怪了吧！

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 今天你也辛苦了~早点休息吧！

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 早睡早起会对身体比较好~我正好也觉得很累…

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 晚安啰~主人你也早点休息~

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 我可以睡在你旁边吗？我们一起休息，明天还要加油呢！

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: 变身这种高深的艺术，你是不会懂得啦！

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: 奇怪了~好像有听到什么，可怎么听不太清楚~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: 超乎你的期待吗？哈哈~不要吓一跳啰~

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 若没到这种水平，怎么能说是变身呢~

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: 嘎呜呜呜~你是想看什么啊？

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: 变身？你懂什么是变身吗？这种东西可不能随便就秀给别人….

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: 现在我正在忙，晚点再说~

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: 我正在运动中！下达指令也要看一下状况嘛！

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: 耶！有没有吓一跳？这才是货真价实的变身！

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: 我特别只秀给主人你喔！如何？

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 别太惊吓！这只是小儿科呢~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: 我没有特别想要坐下来~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: 目前的状况…我不大想要坐下来说~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: 要坐你就自己坐吧！强迫别人是不太好的行为...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: 不要！完全不会感到累…为什么要休息？

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: 好吧！那我就给你坐下来吧！那你要为我做什么啊？

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: 你还满会察言观色的嘛！

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 坐下来还挺舒服耶…那我就多休息一下啰！

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 那我来坐坐看吧！你要坐下来休息啊！

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 我正在运动中！不适当的指令尽可能不要发出来….

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 你说实话！其实是你想要休息吧？

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 难道你要我在这么脏乱的地方坐下吗？

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 我为什么要坐下？若你能提出合理的理由，我再评估可行性吧！

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 话说回来…这还满舒服的耶！

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 好吧！既然你这么有诚意，那我也不好意思拒绝..嘿嘿~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 没错！偶尔就应该坐下来补充体力…

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 你干嘛跑来跟我发脾气？

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 对不起..你就接受我的道歉吧！

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 不会有下次了，原谅我吧！

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: 噗哈哈哈哈！谁胆敢要教训我？

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: 这个~是我做错了，请你谅解~

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: 喔喔~是我错了！原谅我吧！

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: 你是想要反抗我吗？呵呵~

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 你现在有搞清楚状况吗？

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: 好像有什么声音…你有听到什么吗？

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: 这个..是我不对，原谅我吧！

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: 你这是在跟谁耍脾气啊？幼稚！

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 你现在是想要挑战我吗？

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 好像有什么声音…你有听到什么吗？

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: 呵呵~呵呵~这还满让人不知所措耶！

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: 难道你不觉得自己更笨吗？

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: 你说我笨蛋？开玩笑的吧？

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 你这是想要挑战我吗？小心会受伤喔~

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 你知道现在是在跟谁说话吗？

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 你可别把我当小孩子使唤！你看我这威武的模样…怎么可能~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 你是在跟我开玩笑吗？这种幼稚的玩笑就别再闹了！

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: 好像有听到些什么…可怎么听不大懂呢？怪了~

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: 你这是在跟谁耍赖啊！幼稚~

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: 你这是想要挑战我吗？别开玩笑了~

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: 今天风还满大的，要挥动翅膀还满吃力…

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: 搞不清楚状况喔~笨笨的家伙~

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: 你说我笨？你是在说笑吧？

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: 你可别帮我当小孩子使唤！你看我这威武的模样…怎么可能~

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: 你不觉得自己比我笨吗？

string.name: f1_s
string.value: 今天的餐点还真令人满意啊！谢谢你~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: 不要了！我已经吃不下了~

string.name: f2_s
string.value: 谢啦！我正觉得有点饿呢~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 你是想要这种方式，表达你对我的不满吗？真是幼稚啊~

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 好吃耶！营养均衡的餐点是很重要呢~

string.name: f4_f
string.value: 什么啊？又要我吃？你是不是脑筋不清楚啊？要不要去看医生？

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 嗯嗯~很好~必要营养素…还兼顾热量！不错不错~

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: 怎么可能随随便便就说什么便便…

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: 这是什么话？现在应该不是谈论这个的时候吧！

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: 现在有点忙，那件事情…晚点再说！

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: 我最近深受便秘所苦，我的心情…你能了解吗？

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: 噗！还真不好意思啊…这年纪竟然还说什么便便...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: 我最近正好因便秘所苦，今天终于成功了~

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: 哪里有洗手间啊？我正想去方便一下…

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: 现在正要出来…稍等一下！

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 今天风还满大的，要挥动翅膀还满吃力…

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: 好像有听到些什么…可怎么听不大懂呢？怪了~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 怎么可能随随便便就说什么便便…

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 这是什么话？现在应该不是谈论这个的时候吧！

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: 今天没用什么力，还挺顺利的~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 噗！还真不好意思啊…这年纪竟然还说什么便便…

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 神清气爽啊！排泄顺畅是很重要的~

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 现在有点忙，那件事情…晚点再说！

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: 你帮我买点便秘药吧！最近还真不够顺畅啊…

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 今天风还满大的，要挥动翅膀还满吃力…

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 我可不是随地大小便的无赖龙~

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 你能够了解这种通体舒畅的感觉吗？哈哈~

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 神清气爽啊！排泄顺畅是很重要的~

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 现在可以方便一下了吗？我刚好一直忍着呢~

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: 你这是在干什么，保持形象吧！

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: 今天真累...我得休息一下~

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: 是谁在吵吵闹闹的啊？吵到我无法集中精神~

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: 嗯~今天还没无聊没事做耶~

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: 我也爱你…说这还挺害羞的耶~嘿嘿~

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: 你现在才要表白啊！我还在等着呢~

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: 怎么突然说这种话...呵呵~其实我也爱你~

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: 只要有你在，我就很幸福~

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: 是谁在吵吵闹闹的啊？吵到我无法集中精神~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: 嗯…风声还满吵的…今天连辉动翅膀也很吃力耶~

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: 你这是在干什么，保持形象吧！

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: 现在有点忙...我们晚点再说~

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 只要有你在，我就很幸福~

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: 呵呵~你的心意，其实我都晓得啦！

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: 我也爱你…说这还挺害羞的~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: 你现在才要表白啊！我还在等着呢~

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 今天真累...我得休息一下~

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 我说你到底是在说什么啊？说些我听得懂的话吧！

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 我超讨厌这种天气，今天还是少出门比较好…

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 看来你今天是很无聊是吗？没事那来帮我的忙吧！

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 怎么突然说这种话...呵呵~其实我也爱你~

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 只要有你在，我就很幸福~嘻嘻~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 你的心意，其实我都晓得啦！我也最喜欢你了~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 你不说我也晓得…你对我的这份心意~呵呵~

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 老兄~你说些我听得懂的话好不好？这样要怎么对话啊！

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: 是谁在吵吵闹闹的啊？吵到我无法集中精神~

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: 今天真累...我得休息一下~

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 嗯~今天还没无聊没事做耶~

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: 嘎呜~你希望我对你说什么？

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 我想再去见迦尔努斯…请你带我去见他！

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: 你竟然会听得懂我们龙族的话，主人你…不简单喔！

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: 我好想回到以前的样子，你能帮我吗？

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 今天风还满大的，要挥动翅膀还满吃力…

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 你是想跟我说什么？讲清楚一点~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: 你有说什么吗？有种似懂非懂的感觉耶~

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: 现在有点忙...我们晚点再说~

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: 其实我正因某件事情所苦恼…你今天愿意听我说吗？

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: 原来~你是想听我的美妙的声音啊！

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: 你竟然会听得懂我们龙族的话，主人你…不简单喔！

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 我想再去见迦尔努斯…顷你带我去见他！

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 刚刚好像有什么声音耶~主人你有听到吗？

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 老兄~你说些我听得懂的话好不好？这样要怎么对话啊！

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 今天风还满大的，要挥动翅膀还满吃力…

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 好吵…安静点~我要集中精神~

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 这段时间我一直有在观察你喔！嘿嘿~

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 嘎呜~你希望我对你说些什么？

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 你竟然会听得懂我们龙族的话，主人你…不简单喔！

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 你有见过我的朋友吗？我好想见见我的同伴~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: 我说你...怎么整天想要睡觉啊？

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 你有想清楚吗？在这么忙的时间竟然要我睡觉？

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 我好怀念迦尔努斯…想想...他帮我了我不少忙…

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 别净想要睡觉，我们去别的地方吧！这里今天没什么人耶~

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 今天你辛苦了~那晚安啰！

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 晚安！记得要盖好被子~免得感冒~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 那我差不多要休息了~困~Zzz…

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: 你在说什么啊？在这么忙碌的时候…还说什么休息？

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: 嗯..我已较喜欢飞来飞去~

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: 我不要坐…要不要我来告诉你原因啊？

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: 我没有很累…开始打怪也不过那一下下而已呢~

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: 谢啦！坐下来果然舒服多了~

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: 你要不要也坐下来休息一下？休息是为了走更远的路呢~

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: 主人…我觉得你这人很不错的耶！

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: 为了飞更远的路，确实是需要休息一下~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 我好怀念迦尔努斯…他帮我了我不少忙…

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 现在正忙呢~你怎么会想要睡觉？

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 想睡你自己睡吧！我不困~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 晚安！记得要盖好被子~免得着凉~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 那我差不多要休息了~主人你也早点休息~困~Zzz…

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 你这人怎么这么懒散？每天净想着要睡觉~

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 你想到哪里去了？竟然现在就要睡？

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: 有没有搞错啊？现在正忙着呢~

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 今天天气这么好…差不多要去打怪了吧！

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 主人今天你也辛苦了~早点休息吧！晚安~

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 早睡早起会对身体比较好~我正好也觉得很累…

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 晚安啰~主人你也早点休息~

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 我可以睡在你旁边吗？我们一起休息，明天还要再加油呢！

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: 今天真累...我得休息一下~

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: 嗯~ 今天还没无聊没事做耶~

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: 啥咪啥咪？什么东西这么可爱啊？

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: 奇怪了~好像有听到什么，可怎么听不太清楚~

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 嘻嘻~哈哈~呼呼~齁齁~嘎呜~

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: 变身这种高深的艺术，你是不会懂得啦！

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: 奇怪了~好像有听到什么，可怎么听不太清楚~

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: 超乎你的期待吗？哈哈~可别吓一跳啰~

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: 若没到这种水平，怎么能说是变身呢~

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: 嘎呜呜呜~你是想看什么啊？

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: 变身？你懂什么是变身吗？这种东西可不能随便就秀给别人….

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: 现在我正在忙，晚点再说~

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: 我正在运动中！下达指令也要看一下状况嘛！

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: 耶！有没有吓一跳？这才是货真价实的变身！

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: 我特别只秀给主人你喔！如何？

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: 别太惊吓！这只是小儿科呢~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: 目前的状况…我不大想要坐下来耶！

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: 要坐你就自己坐吧！强迫别人是不太好的行为…

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: 不要！完全不会感到累…为什么要我坐下啊？

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: 好吧！那我就坐下来…要不要一起坐啊？

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: 你还满会察言观色的嘛！我正好有点累呢~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 坐下来还挺舒服耶…那我就多休息一下啰！

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 那我就坐下啰！你也一起坐下吧！

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 我正在运动中！建议你发号施令也要看一下情况~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 你说实话！其实是你想要休息吧？

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 你要我坐在这么脏乱的地方吗？

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 我为什么要坐下？若你能提出合理的理由，我再评估可行性吧！

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 被你这么一说，我确实有点累了耶…

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 好吧！既然你这么有诚意，那我也不好意思拒绝..嘿嘿~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 没错！偶尔就应该坐下来补充体力…

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 好吧！我们一起坐吧！这位子看起来挺不错说~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 你干嘛跑来跟我发脾气？

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: 是不是你自己做错事情啦？嘎呜~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 对不起..你就接受我的道歉吧！

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 不会有下次了，原谅我吧！

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: 噗哈哈哈哈！谁胆敢要教训我？

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: 这个~是我做错了，请你谅解~

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: 喔喔~是我错了！原谅我吧！

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: 你是想要反抗我吗？呵呵~

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 你现在是不是还没搞清楚状况，就想要骂我啊？

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: 好像有什么声音…你有听到什么吗？

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: 没错..是我不对，原谅我吧！

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: 你这是在跟谁耍脾气啊？幼稚！

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 你现在是想要挑战我吗？

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 好像有什么声音…你有听到什么吗？

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: 你这人..还满令人哑口无言耶~

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: 你说我笨蛋？开玩笑的吧？

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 你这是想要挑战我吗？小心会受伤喔~

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 你知道现在是在跟谁说话吗？

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 你可别帮我当小孩子使唤！你看我这威武的模样…怎么可能~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 你是在跟我开玩笑吗？这种幼稚的玩笑就别再开了！

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: 好像有听到些什么…可怎么听不大懂呢？怪了~

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: 你这是在跟熟耍赖啊！幼稚~

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: 你这是想要挑战我吗？别开玩笑了~

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: 今天风还满大的，要挥动翅膀还满吃力…

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: 搞不清楚状况喔~笨笨的家伙~

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: 你说我笨？你是在说笑吧？

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: 你可别帮我当小孩子使唤！你看我这威武的模样…怎么可能~

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: 你不觉得自己比我笨吗？

string.name: f1_f
string.value: 你这是干啥？我已经饱了~别再喂我了~

string.name: f1_s
string.value: 我正觉得有点饿..谢谢你啦！今天的菜色真美味耶~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: 我不是说我不饿嘛！你愈是这样，只会让我们的关系恶化！

string.name: f2_s
string.value: 谢谢你..我正饿得有点发慌…差点饿昏了呢！

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 过量进食反而会影响健康，看来你的思虑还不够成熟嘛~

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 今天的菜色还满高级耶~谢啦！主人~

string.name: f4_f
string.value: 你也太过份了吧！竟然是这种菜色…这阵子我要拒绝进食了！

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 喔喔…今天的菜色超乎我的期待！感谢你~

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: This is too easy for me, key!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Ey...I don't wanna do something boring like that...KYU

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? I'm good, right? KYU?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: If my master wants me to...KYU!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hahh...I've just gotte much taller! KYU!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Ey...keeps asking me to do the same thing...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I can't hear you...I can't hear you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master what do you think? I'm good, right?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You won't find a bunny that can stand like I do.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's still a long way to go before coming out...heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? kyu...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago...kyu...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet...KYU

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at bathrooms...KYU

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh...whoa, I almost stepped on it...KYU

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good...whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You ever see a rabbit talk? kyu...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I can't talk to you about things...kyu...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! kyu...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk...kyu...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Is something wrong with you these days...? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, kyu...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: If...you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home...so don't starve me too much...kyu...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world! kyu...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Isn't it not fun playing by yourself? I like hanging out with people...KYU...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I heard there's a dungeon in the middle of this island...KYU...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: There's not much to say but...feed me!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying...I have nothing to say...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired, so I'll tell you later...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I know it's precious, but you need to take those potions while you fight to get stronger fast!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Go do some quests and something good may happen~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! kyu...

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master...please go take shower right now!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: NO~! I don't want to hug you! KYU!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, I'll go hug you up~! Kyu!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, I can feel your heartbeat~! KYU!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Master? You really think I'll hug you up?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: And you were scolding me just now...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: If you feed me, I will

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Master, you smell! I don't wanna hug you~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I like how you embrace me, master

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Play time~ Play time! PLAY TIME!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day...kyu?

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Master! I feel fine~! Hang out with me!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a song, then I'll fall asleep.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You know you're gonna write all over my face while I fall asleep...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cuz I'm hungry! FOOD! FOOD!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Ahh...I'm sleepy...master, give me your arm as my pillow...kyu...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Please don't have delicious food all to yourself while I'm asleep...kyu...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: That wasn't for me, right? kyu?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: That was a typo, right? kyu?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Nice! I feel good~ kyu~

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, I know you're lying. KYU!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You're just saying that, right? KYU?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I love you too, master! KYU!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I'm gonna tell everyone about this...KYU!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: One minute you're all over me, now you say you love me...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you love me, how come you aren't feeding me?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for it again...?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Keeps making me do the same thing over and over again...anything else? kyu...?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Huh? I was thinking of something else for a sec...kyu...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy from sitting down, but...kyu..

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I should just sit here instead of roaming around~kyu~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, kyu??

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, you can't say it right, right? KYU?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...KYU...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, sitting is waay too easy~!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You keep asking me to do some easy thing...KYU~!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I gotta do one for the master every once in a while...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I sat, you need to feed me~

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Man, just letting out on me, kyu!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I wasn't doing anything! WHAT, kyu!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: No more of that scary face...please...kyu...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, what exactly did I do wrong? KYU!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You won't find a more obidient pet around you! KYU!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there! KYU!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: So you're mad at me cuz you're bored, right?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master this is soooo delicious! Kyu!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu~ I am NOT gonna say that!

string.name: s3
string.value: I am definately not a bad rabbit!

string.name: s4
string.value: Don't make me say those words~

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: 我看见一个摸不到的小男孩。

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: 为了这个我今天早上醒来想…

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: 如果我是你的话会更小心…

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 一直开玩笑然后看看会发生什么事。

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 让我表演给你看如何「偷杀」某个人…

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: 我看见你在那儿做的一切。

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 一直开玩笑然后看看会发生什么事。

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 让我表演给你看如何「偷杀」某个人…

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 我看见你在那儿做的一切。

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: 全都塞满了而且没地方去…

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: 我可以坦白地说我的粪便不臭。可是量多。

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 真是神奇不可思议的一坨啊。

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 如果我做了，你可就麻烦了。

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 喂，看啊…只…是放屁而已。抱歉。

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 而且他们还说我是个疯子。

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 即使是死者我想也有一些事必须做。

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 如果我做了，你可就麻烦了。

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: 喂，看啊…只…是放屁而已。抱歉。

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: 而且他们还说我是个疯子。

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: 即使是死者我想也有一些事必须做。

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 我不觉得像在和你谈话~

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 为什么我应该要和你说话呢？

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: 我曾经和蜗牛有过更聪明的对话。

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: 没有动嘴唇，但是无论如何我讲话了。真是令人惊奇！

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 我可以说你喜欢…不，没关系。

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 他们说如果你没有好事的话最好别开口。

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 所以，这家伙走进了一家魔药商店…

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 我真想要一个普兰登盖斯特玩具~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 由于某种原因，我觉得待在消失村中的家是正确的。

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 我不只是会说话，我还说个不停呢！

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 下一个家伙会说「请换我」把大镰刀对着脸。

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 刚才是谁说「请改变路线」？

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 惧怕那个年轻的收割者。

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: 好极了。我甚至不需要一张椅子了！

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 下一个家伙会说「请换我」把大镰刀对着脸。

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 刚才是谁说「请改变路线」？

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 惧怕那个年轻的收割者。

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 我不认为你懂得爱的意义。

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 好吧，好吧。我会尽力试试。

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: 我还没准备好接受那种承诺。

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: 爱？爱是属于活着的人。~啊哈哈

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: 喔~ 别说了！你的话让我脸红。

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: 我们会在一起直到永远。~啊哈哈

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 你最后还是无法抗拒我。

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: 我爱你就跟你喜欢做家事一样多。

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: 我对你的爱就好像是一部刚好没有油的汽车一样。

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: 哈哈！我的计划生效了… 我的意思是--我也爱你。

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 你的生命对我而言非常珍贵。

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: 我爱你就跟你喜欢做家事一样多。

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: 我对你的爱就好像是一部刚好没有油的汽车一样。

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: 哈哈！我的计划生效了… 我的意思是--我也爱你。

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: 你的生命对我而言非常珍贵。

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: 让我们握手来代替吧。 ~ 啊哈哈

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: 你很快就会感觉到我的紧紧环抱。~啊哈哈

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: 只要我们不碰触。~ 啊哈哈

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: 你感到全身精力充沛。你可以给我一些精力吗？

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: 我们握手来代替怎么样…？

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: 很奇怪，但是我认为我喜欢。

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: 我感到这种奇怪的感觉深入我心…

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: 我的碰触不是一种友谊。

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: 你很快就会感觉到我的碰触。

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: 你的敌人应该会感觉到我的接触。

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: 危险靠近时我会警告你！

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: 我的碰触不是一种友谊。

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: 你很快就会感觉到我的碰触。

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: 你的敌人应该会感觉到我的接触。

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: 危险靠近时我会警告你！

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: 你是个怪人。 ~ 啊哈哈

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: 我不想那样做~！ ~ 啊哈哈

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: 不要，那令人作呕~！ ~ 啊哈哈

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: 我的脚闻着像玫瑰花一样。 ~ 啊哈哈

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: 我喜欢万圣节 ~ 啊哈哈

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: 我不是哈士奇，小子。再试一次。

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 你怎么知道我需要休息一下呢？

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: 你给予「带来恶臭」一个全新的含义。

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: 呃... 为什么我应该要那样做？！？

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: 让我们前进至戏弄或请客吧

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: 我们去穿上我们的万圣节装吧！

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: 你可以用那个臭味杀人！

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: 呃... 为什么我应该要那样做？！？

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: 我们为什么不去拿些服装呢？

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: 呃... 为什么我应该要那样做？！？

string.name: c32_s4
string.value: 我们为什么不去拿些服装呢？

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: 没说服力。真的没有说服力。

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: 我最好的恶作剧就是让某个人消失。

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: 我可以把想吃的糖果全吃掉--我的牙齿永远不会掉！

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: 把你要偷吃的糖果全都给我！

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: 我希望这不是捣蛋因为我想接受请客。

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: 我需要一个永远的心跳停止糖。

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: 我希望每天都是万圣节！

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: 万圣节时我应该要穿什么呢？

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: 我想知道僵尸正在做什么？

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: 你给我的那颗糖果吗？我吃掉了。

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: 我把你的糖果卖了，对不起。

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: 我只剩下一颗永远心跳停止糖…而且你不可以吃。

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: 比较像是「被捣蛋了」，我说的对吗？

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: 我听说在普兰登盖斯特特庄园中有一个南瓜洞…

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: 万圣节时我应该要穿什么呢？

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: 巧克力、糖果、泡泡糖、太妃糖… 我全都要！！

string.name: c36_f1
string.value: 你给我的那颗糖果吗？我吃掉了。

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: 我把你的糖果卖了，对不起。

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: 我只剩下一颗永远心跳停止糖…而且你不可以吃。

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: 比较像是「被捣蛋了」，我说的对吗？

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: 我听说在普兰登盖斯特特庄园中有一个南瓜洞…

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: 万圣节时我应该要穿什么呢？

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: 巧克力、糖果、泡泡糖、太妃糖… 我全都要！！

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: 死人行走，所以不是跳舞给我看！

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: 我唯一可以发出爆裂声、卡住和丢弃的是我的骨头…

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: 看看你的四周，这是个毫无节奏的国家！

string.name: c38_s1
string.value: 穿上你的红鞋然后跳布鲁斯。

string.name: c38_s2
string.value: 跳舞，跳舞吧！裤子里有太多舞了~！

string.name: c39_f1
string.value: 我看过跳得更好的殭尸。

string.name: c39_f3
string.value: 如果你偶尔喂我一次的话我就愿意~！

string.name: c39_s1
string.value: 我已经移动步伐了，但你的在那呢？

string.name: c39_s3
string.value: 某种可怕东西潜藏在黑暗中…

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 我的脚只剩骨头了--等着吧。没关系。

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 告诉我要怎么帮你解决问题。

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 你想玩「大风吹」吗？不用了，谢谢。

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 这些脚是用来昂首阔步的！

string.name: c40_f1
string.value: 我看过跳得更好的殭尸。

string.name: c40_f3
string.value: 如果你偶尔喂我一次的话我就愿意~！

string.name: c40_s1
string.value: 我已经移动步伐了，但你的在那呢？

string.name: c40_s3
string.value: 某种可怕东西潜藏在黑暗中…

string.name: c41_f1
string.value: 没有吉他，我不会跳摇滚舞。很悲伤但是真的。

string.name: c41_f2
string.value: 花点时间看看我做了什么。

string.name: c41_f3
string.value: 再问我一次然后你会发现我消失了…

string.name: c42_f2
string.value: 你认为自己可以成为摇滚明星吗？…哈哈哈

string.name: c42_f3
string.value: 我们可不可以假装彼此不认识一下？

string.name: c42_f4
string.value: 你为什么不… 独自… 去那儿的舞会。

string.name: c42_s1
string.value: 我发光的时候到了-- 我独立了！

string.name: c42_s3
string.value: 一旦我开始摇滚，我就留在这儿了！

string.name: c42_s4
string.value: 无论我可以在那里漫游… 我都准备好摇滚了！

string.name: c43_f1
string.value: 我们来玩一个叫作「我不认识你」的游戏吧。

string.name: c43_f2
string.value: 我看过更有天分的摇滚。

string.name: c44_f1
string.value: 我们来玩一个叫作「我不认识你」的游戏吧。

string.name: c44_f2
string.value: 我看过更有天分的摇滚。

string.name: c46_f3
string.value: 哈哈，你好好笑… 滑稽的样子！

string.name: c46_s1
string.value: 我将给你看看吓人的东西！ ~ 啊哈哈

string.name: c47_f1
string.value: 我是收割者！什么都不怕。

string.name: c47_f3
string.value: 你知道，你让我想起了年轻的科学怪人！

string.name: c47_f4
string.value: 我不认为你了解吓人的概念。

string.name: c47_s1
string.value: 千万不要尝试幽灵骑士飞车。你看我的下场！

string.name: c47_s2
string.value: 有些事你无法逃离，即使已经死了。

string.name: c47_s3
string.value: 对我而言… 死亡不可怕！

string.name: c47_s4
string.value: 你怕我吗？很好，那么你只要等到我变大一点就好！

string.name: c48_f1
string.value: 我是收割者！什么都不怕。

string.name: c48_f3
string.value: 你知道，你让我想起了年轻的科学怪人！

string.name: c48_f4
string.value: 我不认为你了解吓人的概念。

string.name: c48_s1

string.value: 对我而言… 死亡不可怕！

string.name: c48_s4
string.value: 你怕我吗？很好，那么你只要等到我变大一点就好！

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: 我的脚只剩骨头了--等着吧。没关系。

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: 告诉我要怎么帮你解决问题。

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 你想玩「大风吹」吗？不用了，谢谢。

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: 这些脚是用来昂首阔步的！

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: 那么，你打算怎么修好这个？

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: 我以为我已经把你教得更好了…

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: 你坐下来改变一下如何？

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 你在跟我说话吗？你是在跟我说话吗？

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 停止狂吠然后我们离开这儿。

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: 请接受我最诚心的道歉，主人。

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: 但是所有的酷孩子都这样啊！

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: 你刚刚说什么？我可不这么认为。

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 你坐下来改变一下如何？

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 你在跟我说话吗？你是在跟我说话吗？

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 停止狂吠然后我们离开这儿。

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 请接受我最诚心的道歉，主人。

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 但是所有的酷孩子都这样啊！

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 你刚刚说什么？我可不这么认为。

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: 你确定要玩这个游戏吗？

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: 来点有挑战性的吧,如果你还能想得出来的话。

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: 我确定我以前玩过这招…

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 吃起来好像鸡肉…或巴洛古…

string.name: f4_f
string.value: 但是我不饿哦... 我不想吃！！呃...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that... bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... I'll just pretend I never heard that... bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? bark...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'll be better... bark... much better...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm hurt inside... pretty bad... bark...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: How can you say such thing... bark...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey... You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey... you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... woof woof...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I'm really really hurt... woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master, you didn't really mean it... right? Woof...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you~~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now... hehe...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday... that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good... just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you... you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like pooping... bark

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Still a long way to go before coming out... heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? bark bark...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago... bark bark...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now, THAT was embarassing~ Bark bark~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Oh man, this smells... bark bark...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master... the poop isn't coming out... bark bark!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel it yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at the bathroom... bark bark

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh... whoa, I almost stepped on it... bark bark

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I almost got constipated... bark bark

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... bark bark

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! Bark bark!!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area... bark bark!!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? bark bark bark!?!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me... hehe... bark!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? bark!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say... woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking... I'm really depressed... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm depressed... everything's annoying... don't feel like talking... woof...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change the menu every once in a while... I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island... woof woof~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else... woof woof...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey... how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man... do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there... haha

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart. What can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry. just feed me!!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like... this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well... right? Right?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it... woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here... woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My... my legs are short, that's why it's hard... woof!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa... with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? bark bark...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else... and I didn't hear it... woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~! Woof woof!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe... I feel good... woof woof!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I can't understand what the master is saying~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: It's too hard to understand~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Bark bark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I don't want to sit! BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh... this is easier~ BARK BARK~

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: We huskies don't have hands! Bark!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I don't want to do it~ bark!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Haha! Just tell me what to do, and I'll do it!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: This is waay too easy! Bark!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ Woof woof~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ Woof woof!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh... itchy... (acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something harder.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Still telling me to sit? It's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My hind legs are so short. I feel more comfortable sitting like this... hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here... this is the right way, right?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here... BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore... BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look... bark bark!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times... why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, boredom doesn't give you the right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out... wooof...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man, master's going off on me again and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master, things happen sometimes... why so mad??

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr... master's not happy over nothing...

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master... I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore... woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore... woof woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't make me say bad words! Woof!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: What do you think I am, an animal?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: There's some on your shoe if you're looking for it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You want me to stink up the joint? No!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I hope someone steps in it!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Fresh out. Try back later-like after dinner.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I could end battles with this gas...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Nothing compares to the feeling of a great dump. Nothing!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Let me show you how to make a "prickly bush".

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This is as good a spot as any...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I charge 5000 mesos per word. Pay up.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When the going gets tough, the tough get going!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Do not ever mistake me for a hedgehog.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: The Mapler next to me is almost broke.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Doesn't that guy owe you money?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'll talk when golden pigs fly.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: No time like the present! Let's go!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I could get used to this...

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You never know what's around the corner-be prepared!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: When the going gets tough, I've seen you run away. Fast.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You don't need a breath mint, you just need to get socked in the face with a mint glove.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Say something? How about "I'm not talking right now?"

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Put your mesos where your mouth is!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: My spikes are sharp-if you lean close, I can give you a shave.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love it when you level!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: There is no spark in our relationship.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Amusing. Do you do tricks, too?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I can see it in your eyes...it's not true!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can feel a spark-no, wait. Something was in my foot...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: How funny! HAHAH-wait, you were serious?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I've waited so long to hear you say that!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Your love keeps me going, Master!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you just as much!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: The ground is nice and warm here.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I've got a lotta love to spread around!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Let's not and say we did.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I feel a bit uncomfortable now...

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I should throw one at you...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Why do you hurt me so?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I've got all the pins you need!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I got plenty of sleep last night.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: The ground is cold and hard, I'm not sleeping here!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: So now you notice I'm tired?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: No way, you're going to try something.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Yea, right, sleep. I don't need any.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: *YAWN* I think I'm ready for bed.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Your orders aren't exactly clear you know...

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: You talk, I ignore you-it's a great combo!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Who's the brains behind this operation again?

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I guarantee this is your fault.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I knew I could do it!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Trying to lure me into a trap? I don't think so.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No pillow, so I can't sit.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Porcupines do not speak that language.

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm a stickler for perfection. HA!

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: What do I look like? A store?

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: You need more than a comb.

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: It's mine, and you can't have it.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Tell me how good I look...

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: You can't have mine, get your own.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Got a camera? I'm going to strike a pose.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I love being one of the beautiful people!

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: I need coconut milk before I do anything.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Have you fed your porcupine today?

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I love to play with this ball!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Ninja do not reveal themselves in the day time.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: What make you think I can do that?

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Try again. This time with FEELING!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: And I would do this because...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Look a bit closer, you'll see why I'm not sitting.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Did you see the sign? "Porcupines forbidden to sit".

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: If only I had a chair...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You picked the perfect time to relax, Master!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Time to chill. Got any Mapleade?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: All I need now is a snack...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Somehow, I will blame you for this.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Quit looking at me like that.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Nonsense-you told me to do it!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: No way is this my fault, no way!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Blaming me again? I refuse to cover for you this time!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Wait, I have something for you...the world's smallest violin.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't be mad with me, Master!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: When in a fit, just knit!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You threw away the last thing I made...

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll finish the socks I was making for you!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I just got the best cloth...

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: How about a sock...in the mouth?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: If the knit don't fit, it's time to quit!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I got a new design to show you!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Time to make my Master a new pair of undies!

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Maybe I'll make you a pair of pants...

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Um, did you run over that?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: But I'm not hungry..I don't want to eat!! Waahhh!!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: 我好像是… 得了便秘了耶! 酷奥~

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: 那样看着我，我都没法嗯嗯了耶~ 酷酷~

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: 我不随地嗯嗯噢~ 酷奥噢~

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: 啊嗯~? 爽快啊! 酷噢~

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: 嗯啊啊 好爽快啊~ 酷噢~?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: 啊嗯~ 好害羞啊，为什么老看着这边啊~ 酷酷~?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 现在不想嗯嗯噢~ 酷噢~~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: 我又不想怎么嗯嗯啊! 酷奥噢噢!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 不要不要嘛~ 想在不想嗯嗯噢~

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 嗯嗯不是随时都可以的~ 酷噢~

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 噗噗噗~ 真爽快啊~ 酷酷酷酷~?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: 酷酷~ 你怎么知道我想嗯嗯呢?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 我得嗯嗯了~ 酷噢~ （…噗~…）

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 啊啊~ 好爽快啊~ 酷噢~?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 我以后也不随地嗯嗯! 酷噢~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: 随地嗯嗯不是一个文化人的作为! 酷酷酷!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 我不想嗯嗯噢! 酷奥噢噢!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 酷奥噢! 我不要嗯嗯!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 爽快地 噗~嗯 酷酷酷酷~?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 爽快地来一下? 酷奥~?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 如果需要随时! 噗嗯~

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 噗嗯~ 噗噗! 好爽快噢~ 酷噢~?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: 不会是... 我? 酷奥~

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 酷~ 我知道你在说谎啦~

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 酷酷~ 就当我没听见吧.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 酷酷~ 好开心~ 呼唔~?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 酷噢~ 好害羞.. 我也是~?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: 表示一下你的诚意噢! 酷酷!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 我.. 要拒绝噢! 酷奥噢噢~

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 现在不想说话喔! 酷噢~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: 到底要说什么呢! 酷噢~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: 啊~ 我想演奏吉他耶… 酷酷~

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 叽叽喳喳 ~ 以为我很吵吧?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 有时候不想说话噢~ 酷奥噢噢!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 多获得好的道具吧！酷酷~?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 我真的好可爱噢! 酷酷~?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 酷酷~ 伴着吉他声，唱一句? 酷酷~?

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 想飞翔在天空中~ 酷酷~?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: 酷酷! 我想歌唱耶~ 酷噢~?酷~?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 酷酷~ 不要老命令我嘛!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 我漂亮我可爱, 还很会说话噢! 酷酷~~?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 我唱得多么动听啊~ 来一句? 酷噢噢噢~~?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 还是和我有共同语言吧?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 我想再玩会儿! 酷酷~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 要集中精神打猎! 酷噢~

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 酷酷~ 好困噢! 酷噢噢噢~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 酷唔~ 酷~ 困啊~ 酷噢~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 我要睡觉，不要吵醒我噢~ 酷噢~?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 这个级别，我能睡得着吗?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: 给我个温暖的被子哦~ 酷奥噢噢

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 酷酷! 我现在想玩耍呢~

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 酷噢~ 我要睡觉~ 要认真打猎多获得分数呢!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 你让我睡的，不要叫醒我噢! 酷酷~

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 一起 酷~ 睡吧! 酷噢~

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: 现在不是时候耶! 酷!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: 什么? 听不到哦! 酷酷!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: 不是随时都能看到的，特别地! 酷酷!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: 现在专心打猎啦? 酷!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: 你让我做我就做吗! 酷!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: 这不是随时随地都能做得!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: 酷酷! 不要~ 噗~~噗

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: 酷噢~ 卟咯咯! 占!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 随着节奏变身成功! 酷酷~?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: 让我做我就做吗? 酷酷~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 坐下来好舒服喔~ 酷奥~?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 没什么大不了的~ 这样就可以了吧? 酷!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 不行! 我不随便坐在一个地方!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 酷酷! 有时候我也想反抗一下噢!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 我又可爱又听话~ 酷~?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 呼呜~ 还是坐下来舒服啊~ 酷噢~?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 老想坐下噢! 酷酷酷~?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: 今天不想坐下噢! 酷奥嗯~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 呼呼! 让我做我就做啊? 酷酷!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: 你自己坐呗! 酷酷~ 生气吧~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 酷~ 我真是无所不能啊!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 既然坐下了就休息会儿?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 有什么大不了的~ 这样做就好了吧? 酷!

string.name: c5
string.value: 爹爹|不行|要训你了噢|要被教训一下吗

string.name: c6
string.value: 爹爹|不行|要训你了噢|要被教训一下吗

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: 我做错什么了.. 酷奥~

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: 竟然训这么小巧可爱的我! 酷啊啊!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 我要反抗噢! 酷噢酷酷!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: 什么? 竟然教训我! 酷奥~

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: 嗯啊 对不起嘛. 酷噢~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: 我… 对不起.. 酷噢噢~

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: 怎么能打我呢~ 酷噢噢~

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: 这次是我错了. 酷奥呼呼~

string.name: c7
string.value: 爹爹|不行|要训你了噢|要被教训一下吗

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: 我… 对不…起.. 以为我会真么说吧? 酷奥奥!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: 为什么打我! 我做错什么了?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 呼呼! 你以为打我就会挨打吗? 酷奥奥~

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 竟敢向我发火! 不可饶恕! 酷奥!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: 为什么发脾气呢~ 酷啊啊~

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: 啊啊! 好疼啊~ 酷噢~

string.name: c8
string.value: 爹爹|不行|要训你了噢|要被教训一下吗

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: 竟敢向我发火? 酷奥奥! 我要复仇!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 酷哈啊啊! 竟敢向我发火! 不可饶恕!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 酷噢噢噢! 向我发火了~ 是吗?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 竟然向我发火! 啊! 我要逃跑~

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 呜呜 ?? 以后不敢了~ 酷奥~

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 为什么这样对我~ 酷啊啊~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 原谅我吧. 我会成为听话的好孩子~ 酷噢?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: 酷酷~ 没有胃口啦! 酷噢~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 给我更好吃的嘛~ 酷~

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 酷~ 要吃好的要听话~?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 酷酷! 好好吃噢，我要飞走了耶~?

string.name: s3
string.value: 为什么让我说这些呢! 酷!

string.name: s4
string.value: 说坏话要被打噢! 酷奥!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: 我不太喜欢过圣诞节说~

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: 期待已久的圣诞节，终于到来了！

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: 祝你可以收到很多很多的礼物喔~

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: 不晓得圣诞老公公会给什么礼物耶！

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: 圣诞节？不是已经过了吗？

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 希望你有个幸福难忘的圣诞节！

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: 我得约约朋友一起去过圣诞节啰~

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 没有礼物吗？真是失望啊~

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 希望你有个快乐幸福圣诞节喔！

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: 你看别的地方是什么意思？

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: 你以为我会乖乖听你的话吗？

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: 我的眼睛…是不是很漂亮啊？

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: 我最可爱了，是不是有什么礼物啊？

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 你又不给我饭吃，还要我做什么有的没的啊~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 你愿意帮我实现愿望吗？

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 你这么想看我装可爱啊？嘻嘻~

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 你到底想怎样？还是去打怪吧！

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 原来你这么喜欢我啊！我也超喜欢你说~

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: 好害羞喔！我真的这么可爱吗？

string.name: c17
string.value: 住手|不行|不可以|别乱来

string.name: c18
string.value: 住手|不行|不可以|别乱来

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 你怎么这样？又不是我的错。

string.name: c19
string.value: 住手|不行|不可以|别乱来

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: 你想不想被我的雪球打啊？

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 你是不是想跟我打一场啊？

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 刚刚才说我可爱…现在竟然…

string.name: c20
string.value: 住手|不行|不可以|别乱来

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: 我现在心情不太好，你不要惹我~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 你再继续这样，我可是会用雪球攻击你！

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 你再别念我了，管好你自己吧！

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 就算被骂，但我还是最喜欢你了。

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 我会反省的，我现在是乖雪娃娃。

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 我不会反抗，我会乖乖的~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 好烦啊！你就别来烦我了~

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 我才不會受人指使就隨便亂說話的！

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: 难道你没有朋友吗？去找朋友聊吧！

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 你有收到很多圣诞礼物吗？

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 圣诞节…是一个让人感到幸福的节日耶！

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: 你是不是只有我一个朋友啊？

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: 哼！你以为只要是你说的，我就会照做吗？

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: 好烦喔！别管那么多，我们快快去打怪吧！

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: 我喜欢凉爽的地方，太热我可是会融化掉呢…

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: 我是世上最可爱的雪娃娃~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: 你真是个不错的家伙，我们一起去打怪吧！要快快升级嘛！

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 好冷喔~拜托你帮我买手套和帽子吧！最好是适合我的装备….

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: 很无聊啊？我可是很忙呢~

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: 若你愿意多陪陪我玩，那我再考虑看看~

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: 我今天没心情说什么话。

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: 你只顾着要我说话，你自己都没在听嘛！

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: 不是有一个叫冰峰雪域的地方吗？我好想去那里喔！

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: 我们去一个可以感受圣诞节气息的地方吧！

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: 你也快去穿上雪娃娃服装，我们一起拍照吧！

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 我觉得圣诞节有一种让人感到幸福的魔力耶！

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: 现在？我精神可好的很呢~

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: 我刚打瞌睡醒来，精神好的很呢！

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: 我饿了~睡不着~饿了饿了饿了~

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: 这里人太多了，睡不着啦！

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: 我睡不着耶！我们一起去玩吧！

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: 我想玩，我不要睡~我不要睡！

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: 我好想知道圣诞礼物有什么…害我都不想睡觉。

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: 别烦我啦！今天没那个心情~

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: 你对快要饿昏的雪娃娃，怎么有那么多要求啊？

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: 有看到吗？是不是太快没有看清楚？

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: 你以为我会乖乖变身吗？

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: 你自己试试看！这可不是你想象的那么容易…

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: 你以为这么容易啊？先来点吃的再说！

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: 没问题！让你瞧瞧我华丽的变身吧！

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: 如何？有看清楚吗？我那华丽的变身！

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: 太过分了！我不要听这种话~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 你再继续这样，我就要融化掉消失不见喔！

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: 我再也不要跟你玩了，你就孤苦伶仃渡过这个寒冬吧！

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 我火大到快要让雪融化掉了！

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 你再继续这样，我就要融化掉消失不见喔！

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 你该不会是对我说的吧？

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: 什么？你刚刚说什么了？听不清楚啦！

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: 我对爱情这种东西，不是很了解说。

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: 我也爱你喔~有你在身边的圣诞，我再也不会孤单了！

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: 那种话，应该要跟你心上人说吧？

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 你刚刚不是说讨厌我吗？

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: 我也爱你喔~有你在身边的圣诞，我再也不会孤单了！

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 我知道你都是说说而已，我才不会相信你呢！

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 啥咪？我刚刚恍神了一下，你有说什么吗？

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: 我能够感受到你的心意，超幸福的！

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 好开心喔~好像要飞起来的感觉呢！

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 我也最爱你了！我要永远陪在你身边！

string.name: f2_f
string.value: 我想来点心新鲜的…红豆刨冰好了！

string.name: f2_s
string.value: 好好吃喔~我最爱吃雪块了。

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 好好吃喔！有东西吃的我，实在太幸福了！

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Kino don't know what you're saying!

string.name: s2
string.value: Aroo! Don't say such a thing!

string.name: s3
string.value: That's not a nice thing to say, you know!

string.name: s4
string.value: No! Don't say such a thing!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why do this to cute Kino? Sob sob...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: It's not a free service, you know...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You're the only one for me, master~

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: You mean...you want Kino to say something?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: No! Kino's not in the mood for talking now.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Kino will just go to sleep now.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Kino will dream of you, master~

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: No! You just don't do things like that.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: No, no! Kino don't do such a thing.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You should've at least prepared nice, sparkling stones.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You can't just walk around saying that!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Kino wanna meet master in my dream~

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Kino have no idea what you're saying... Aroo~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Aroo! You wanna hear something funny? Eh, maybe next time~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Aroo! Aroooo! Kino is so happy to be with you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Kino wants some juice in the relaxing chair.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Here's Kino's cute bleh attack! Ha ha!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Even Kino's bleh is so cute!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit now!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Eeek! How dare you feed me such an awful thing?!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: No! No! Kino don't do such a thing.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Shouldn't you buy some food first?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Kino don't want any of that.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You want a nice cool drink?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Aroo... Kino is kinda tired today. How about you?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Kino wanna go on an adventure with you.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What? What did you just say?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No no no~ Kino don't know such a thing.

string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit!
