有没有看见我吃剩下的香蕉啊?
今天去健身俱乐部的话，能见到那个美女吗……
哎呀呀……差点就踩到蟑螂啦>.<
哇呜哇呜～天气实在太好啦！
最近有什么有意思的电影没？推荐一下吧。^0^
不要每天在那儿打猎，偶尔也出去运动运动嘛～！
和周围的朋友们好好相处。不要为了道具而争吵嘛～！

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 我到底做错了什么？干嘛对我这样嘛～

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 不知道你在说什么话……你是什么意思啊？

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: 哦，主人你太肉麻了……啊哈哈，我不喜欢这样！

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: 我是为了被爱而诞生的宠物……嘎嘎嘎嘎～

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 主人，说得我怪难为情的～囧

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 光说不练？说爱我不给点什么礼物吗～

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 嘴上说爱我，每天还尽让我干一些烦人的事情！我不相信喏！哼

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 那时候我看到主人和别人在一起。不要让我受伤……

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 哇呜哇呜～我可以感受到主人温暖的心～！

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 即使主人不说，我一看你的眼睛就知道了。

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: 你是不是得先告诉我要说什么啊？

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: 很少有事情比说话更让人讨厌的了。

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 我好累。稍微休息一下再走吧～囧

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: 高高山边清泉水～有谁过来喝一口～

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: 今天的工作结束后，得去健身房去锻炼锻炼～＝_＝＋

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 你是买我来说话的吗？而且我是很尊贵的！

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 过来。在这里我不能说话……嗖……啪啪～

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 你不要让我烦……要不然我会躲到你的包裹中不出来！

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 看看我的个头吧……站着都很累。别让我说话了好不好嘛！

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 我肚子饿了……我想吃蘸了汽油酱的香蕉。

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 听说巨大的首领怪身上有很棒的道具，是不是真的啊？

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 不要每天都在一个地方打猎，去新的地方嘛！@_@

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 不知道今年的会有什么好看的剧场版？我好期待柯南哦～

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 肚子好饿啊。我们吃了饭再开始吧……

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 我要休息一下……你去打仗吧。

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: 什么是攻击啊？这个命令我不知道。

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: 哎呦……你去打吧～我只不过是个宠物！囧

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: 准备好了的话就冲过去！

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: 你在干什么～果断地开始攻击！

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 今天累死了。最好能上哪儿泡个桑拿～

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 为什么要战斗～应该好好相处才对嘛。

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 如果你想去战斗，你自己去好啦！

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 待会儿有个足球比赛，我能先走吗。对不起，你自己好好战斗吧～

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 哇呜哇呜～我数一～二～三就开始！

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 让你看看什么叫做战斗……来吧～GOGO！！

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 你害怕的话就只管跟我来吧。好的，攻击开始了！

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 轰轰轰……我敲打胸脯的话，伙伴们就会出现。攻击！！

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 大白天的睡什么觉啊？囧

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 看看我的眼睛。还精神得很呐！

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: 睡觉对机器人有什么意义吗？

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 白天睡了很长时间，现在我一点都不困。

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 好歹先让我吃点饭再睡……

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 你先睡吧。我得先运动一下才能睡觉。一二一二～

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 今天一天辛苦啦。好好睡吧！

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 干完了一天的工作……睡个好觉真是太舒服了！

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 对我来说，睡觉和死亡没啥两样！不要在那儿吓唬人！

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 哎呀……你不是说还有事情要做吗？这么快就睡啦～

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: 天海亮得很呢……干嘛这么早睡啊～

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 听说吃完饭就睡觉就会变成猪。是不是真的？你去问你父母好了～

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 啊～肚子吃饱了……太累了，感觉马上就要睡着了～

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 主人你也好好睡吧。一定要梦见我哦！

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 一天之中我最喜欢睡觉时间啦！哇呜哇呜～～

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 今天最好能做一个发财的梦～

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: 来你看看我粗壮的胳膊。

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: 变身一次需要10把香蕉。知道了吗？

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: 你让我做我就得做啊？嘎嘎

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: 我们略过变身这一步吧。太麻烦了～～囧

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: 你想让我变成什么样子呢～你说吧！

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: 好，现在你可以攀着我的胳膊玩了！

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: 我让你看看被封印的力量……

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 现在谁都无法阻挡我了。

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: 你以为我是变身机器人吗～我只不过是宠物～囧rz

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: 我？我不会变身啊……你错看你的宠物了～

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: 主人……我们不要变身了，去玩吧……太麻烦了～

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: 你是不喜欢我现在的样子，对吧？太过分了～

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: 好，让你看看我的力量。哇呜哇呜～～

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: 我的衣服撕破了你也别吃惊，也别哭！

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: 变身需要一些时间，请你理解～哇呜！

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: 本来再变强已经很困难了……不过既然是主人的拜托，我就拼一下吧。

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: 你让我坐下，我必须坐下吗！？

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: 咣当……咣当……没看见我正在走路吗？

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: 我挺喜欢坐着的。哇呜哇呜～～

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 我累了……真是个不错的命令。

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 主人也一起坐下休息吧！

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 你知道吧？我是稀有宠物……而且是稀有中的稀有哦。不要随便对我！

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 系统中没有这样的命令吧？

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 让我坐下？如果你帮我铺好坐垫，也许我会考虑一下～

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 我的主人无法容忍宠物辛苦哦！你真好！哇呜哇呜～

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 刚好累了，我们一起坐下来喝杯汽油，休息一下吧。哇呜～

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 哦～你怎么知道我最喜欢坐着？还挺有眼光的嘛～

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 坐得好才是合格的宠物。呵呵，实际上我的特长就是坐下。

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: 讨厌我的话趁早把我扔掉好了！哇呜哇呜～

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: 我就知道你会这么说，所以事先我把那个命令删除了。哇哈哈哈哈。

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: 对不起，我也不是很喜欢你！

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: 你有没有脑子？我可是很可怕的宠物！

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: 你这样说我会很伤心的呢……

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: 我绝对服从主人的命令！我是傻瓜。

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: 主人也因为我是宠物就看不起我吗！我会受伤的啦……哇呜哇呜～

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 是谁在说谁是傻瓜啊。噗～

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: 你居然不知道我是超稀有的宠物吗……呼……（绝望状）

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: 主人说我是傻瓜，我就是傻瓜。敬礼～！

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: 脑袋上的7号螺丝好像有点松了。能帮我拧紧吗？

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: 我曾经是大家都很瞩目的机器人，如果能定期进行检查的话，就不会这样了……

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: 不管怎样，我还是只听主人的话～

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 哇呜哇呜～拜托你说点能让我听懂的话～

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 我到底做错了什么啊？你说啊！

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 不要嘛……主人，你不要冲我发火～

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 对不起……以后再也不敢了喏！

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: 你以为你能阻止我吗？噗，真是可笑啊～

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: 干嘛这样啊～主人比看起来的要小气？

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: 我不知道我做错了什么～你自己好好干吧！

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: 孔咣孔咣，主人是在冲我发火吗？你动真格吗？

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: 呜呜～～是我错了，主人……别讨厌我～～

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: 忘了过去的事情吧……以后我会乖乖的的啦～！

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: 嘎嘎～我可是稀有宠物哦……你就不能对我好一点吗？真是的喏～

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: 哇呜哇呜～呜哦哦～～轰轰轰～～不要讨厌我～

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: 喂……没有血量药水啦。快去补充一点吧。－口－

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: 喂……没有魔量药水啦。快去补充一点吧。－口－

string.name: e_levelup
string.value: 哎呀……祝贺你升级啦！你变得更强了！

string.name: e_prelevelup
string.value: 好～经验值还剩下没多少了。主人加油哦～！

string.name: e_rest
string.value: 主人，你又丢下我去哪里啊～??

string.name: f3_f
string.value: 怎么拿这种旧式电池给我啊。扔掉～

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 这个电池的味道真是好极了！

string.name: f4_f
string.value: 给我吃这种东西，这段时间还让我做牛做马！？

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 吃饭的时候是我最最幸福的时刻！再给我一点～～

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: 在升级之日到来之前，加油。

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: 在升级之日到来之前，加油。

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: 和头顶上亮着灯泡的NPC对话，就可以开始执行任务。

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: 和头顶上亮着灯泡的NPC对话，就可以开始执行任务。

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: 看你拿我怎么样……看你那我怎么样……

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: 哎呀，没有足够的能量变身了。

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: 让你瞧瞧我的真面目……嘿！

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: 让你看看我的神奇变身！

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 哈哈哈……怎么样……很漂亮吧？

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: 没错，变身就是我的特技。

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 我现在已经很漂亮了，不需要什么变身。

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 让你看看什么叫做神奇。

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 让你看看我美丽的真面目。

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 不明白你到底想让我做什么。

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: 我是高贵的圣诞鹿，不要命令我！

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: 好，到了让你见识见识我的特技的时候了。

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: 变身可不是什么人都会的哦，我可是神圣的圣诞鹿！

string.name: c17
string.value: 喜欢|心情好|哼着小曲儿

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 别拿这种水货来糊弄我……

string.name: c18
string.value: 喜欢|心情好|哼着小曲儿

string.name: c19
string.value: 喜欢|心情好|哼着小曲儿

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: 我是高贵的圣诞鹿，不要命令我！

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: 让我坐这里？那我美丽的毛皮就要被弄脏了。

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: 我不想坐。要坐你自己坐吧！

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: 我只会坐在干净的雪地上。

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: 太好了，我的腿正疼着呢……

string.name: c20
string.value: 喜欢|心情好|哼着小曲儿

string.name: c21
string.value: 我爱你|我喜欢你|我的爱

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 我是神圣的圣诞鹿，你觉得自己配得上我吗？

string.name: c22
string.value: 我爱你|我喜欢你|我的爱

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: 爱是要用行动来表达的，不是嘴上说说就行了的。

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: 抱歉，我已经有喜欢的人了。

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: 我们是天造地设的一对。

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 要天天对我说“亲爱的”哦。

string.name: c23
string.value: 我爱你|我喜欢你|我的爱

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: 啊？什么时候开始喜欢我了？

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: 我的人气什么时候就只有这种程度了？

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: 就算世界末日……也一定只爱我一个哦！

string.name: c24
string.value: 我爱你|我喜欢你|我的爱

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: 要听神秘国度雪之女王的故事吗？很久很久以前……

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: 又想听故事了，来，到这边来……

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: 原来是想听我讲故事啊，雪之女王啊……

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: 在遥远的西方……白雪覆盖的国度……

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: 现在又饿又累，下次再讲吧。

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: 在西方国度的雪白宫殿里……

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: 上次讲到哪里了？西方国度里……

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: 我是在雪的灵气包围中成长起来的神圣宠物。

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: 你怎么知道我会讲人类的语言？

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: 我知道很多有趣的故事哦。

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: 我来给你讲讲我住过的雪之宫殿的故事吧……在西方国度里……

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: 我可是神圣之物，不可以随便命令我。

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: 我可不是你说坐下就乖乖坐下的普通宠物。

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: 连椅子都没有，让我坐哪儿啊！

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: 好好照顾我吧，我会更听话的！

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 好累啊，坐下来休息休息。

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: 现在还没到睡觉时间嘛。

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: 真是累死了……小睡一会儿。

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 讨厌！怎么能让我坐地上。

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: 我可是幸福村最神圣的宠物，怎么能随便对待我呢？

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 不要对我命令来命令去的，我不吃这套。

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 走来走去，走了一整天了，我的腿有点吃不消了。

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 怎么突然让我坐下？怎么回事？

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 噗通 ~ 真是疲劳的一天。

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 让我坐下，有什么话要对我说吗？

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: 我是高贵的圣诞鹿，请不要冲我大喊大叫！

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: 我做错了什么，要这样教训我？

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: 为什么教训我？我搞不明白。

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 干嘛总教训我？你这套在我这里行不通。

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: 我要去告诉圣诞老爷爷……

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: 你说，我到底做错了什么……呜呜……

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: 用不着那么大声，我也听得懂……哼哼……

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 我要回圣诞老爷爷那里，呜呜……

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 为什么成天就只教训我，好郁闷啊……

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 我可是神圣的圣诞鹿啊……

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: 完全不明白你在说什么。

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: 我什么时候跟你开玩笑了。

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: 啊啦啦，啊啦啦……啊啦啦，啊啦啦

string.name: f1_f
string.value: 真难吃……换点我想吃的东西吧。

string.name: f2_f
string.value: 每天都给我这么难吃的东西吃……呜呜……

string.name: f3_s
string.value: 今天的东西格外好吃呢！

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Just a glass of juice please~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: No poop now. Glass of juice please~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Kino can poop only in potty.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Just can't do it now. Aroo......

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Kino don't know what you're saying!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Kino wanna meet you master in dream~

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Nothing is better than relex chair.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Drinking a juice and sitting on a comfy chair... Aroo~~~

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Kino will dream of you master~

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: What? Kino don't know what that is. Aroo~

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You know what's in my bag? Aroo~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Kino wanna relex in relex chair!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Kino have no idea what you're saying..Aroo~

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Kino wanna go on an adventure with you.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Aroo.. Kino is kinda tired today. How about you?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: No! Kino's not in the mood for talking now.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: You mean........You want Kino to say something?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Kino will just go to sleep now.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Kino wants some juice in the relex chair.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Aroo! Aroooo! Kino is so happy to be with you.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Aroo! You want hear something funny? Well, maybe next time~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You can't just walk around saying that!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: At least you should have prepared nice sparkling stones.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Yeek! You're not serious, are you?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Forget about love stuff. Let's just have some juice.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Phew... Kino need to sit for now...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Nothing beats the lovely orange juice.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Nevermind~ Kino will have some juice now.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Kino's heart is pounding too. Arooo....

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What? What did you just said?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Kino don't want any of that.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Even Kino's bleh is so cute!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Shouldn't you buy some food first?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: No! No! Kino don't do such a thing.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Even Kino's bleh is so cute!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Kino's bleh is just so adorable!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: No, you just don't do that like that.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: No! No! Kino don't do such a thing.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Even Kino's bleh is so cute!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Here's Kino's cute bleh attack for you! Ha ha!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: It's not a free service you know...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Can't just do it all the time you know.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: It's not to be seen just anywhere.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Too much only spoils the fun.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Let's just sit and relax, ok?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No no no~ Kino don't know such a thing.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You want some nice cool drink?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Want some juice in relex chair?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit now!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Kino wanna rest now with master.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: How nice~ I want some juice too.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Kino will have some juice now.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why doing this to cute Kino? Sob sob...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Arooo...Why doing this to cute Kino?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: How dare you to be mad at Kino. Aroo!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Argh! I hate you for being mad at me.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: How dare you to be mad at Kino. Aroo!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How dare you to be mad at Kino. Aroo!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Arrrr~ Don't be mad at Kino.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Eeek! How dare you to feed me with such an awful thing!

string.name: s2
string.value: Aroo! Don't say such a thing!

string.name: s3
string.value: That's not a nice thing to say you know!

string.name: s4
string.value: No! Don't say such a thing!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: No, I don't feel like it.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Quack! It's rude to poop in public!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I poop when I want to.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'd poop if you fed me.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Quack Quack I don't tell you when to poop!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That's the last time I eat at the pet park!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I have a lot on my mind right now, sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: My poop is none of your business!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ahhhhhh, please don't look. It's embarassing

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Careful, you might step in it!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: That's a big smell for a small duck!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: No. I spit when I talk.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk to you!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I like getting closer to you.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I love hearing I LOVE YOU!!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Just being near you makes me bored.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I can't talk to someone uglier than I am.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I think I have a sore throat!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Quack! I'm a duck, not a professional film and television actor!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: It's fun being a travelling duck!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I'd like to hear a joke!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone to talk to?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Have you thought about getting a haircut?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Somebody needs to go on a diet!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: An apple a day keeps the doctor away!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Nothing like a duck hug! Quack quack!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Do I look like I want to hug you? QUACK!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Go jump in a lake! Seriously...you smell.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Boss, don't you have any perfume?

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Big hugs for my favorite boss!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I feel so close to you! Quack!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't hug people I don't like.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Quack Quack! Duck hugs are the best!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'd take a duck hug over a bear hug any day!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do we need to have a talk?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Quack! You're not so bad yourself!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I only love those who shower.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Quack quack, I love you too!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You need to decide if you love me or hate me.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm having a horrible hair day.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: How can you resist this face? Quack!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I got it from my mom!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Quack! You can't make me be cute.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: It's a blessing and a curse.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I just want to be left alone.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Quack quack, why don't you be cute?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Say it again! You know you love me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I do it for you boss!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Quack! I'm so cute it should be illegal!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'm don't do stupid tricks for stupid people.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Being cute doesn't just happen! It takes time and effort.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You're not the boss of me! Well...technically you are.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: It's one of my best qualities!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Anything you want boss! You got it!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Being beautiful doesn't just happen! It takes time and effort.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Glad you see my true potential!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I'm the best looking swan in the country!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I don't want to sleep right now!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Quack! I'm tired! You know me so well.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I don't take cat naps, I take duck naps!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Are you trying to get rid of me?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You can't tell me what to do!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Sigh...I guess I can do that.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I can't sleep if I'm not tired!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Yay! I love a good nap!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Okay, but can we get some lunch when I wake up?

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: I'd enjoy catching some Z's! Zzzz...

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I don't take cat naps, I take duck naps!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Don't be jealous of me! Let's see you dance!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I only dance with people I love.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: How many times will you ask me to dance?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Quack! Who do you think you are?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me fat and lazy?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No way, White Ducks get dirty too easily!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Quack! Is this the right place?

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You should try reading a book.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: You can't tell me what to do!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: To be or not to be...dinner...that is the question.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: The simplest solution is always the best!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Never assume malice when stupidity will explain everything.

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I think, therefore I am...a duck?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Why did Sally sell seashells by the seashore?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: The measure of a Mapler is determined by his friends.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Who do you think you are?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Now is not a good time...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Just because you're lazy doesn't mean I am.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Quack quack! You got it Boss!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Don't take your anger out on me!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Quack, that's a bad look for you.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there, quack quack!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Wow boss, I really didn't mean it!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Quack, I'm really scared right now!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Quack quack, I don't think so.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: QUACK! I don't feel like it.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I wanted to stretch my legs anyway!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're lucky to have such a smart duck.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Hey, I'm much taller now! Quack Quack.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Why do you keep asking me to do the same thing?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: I can't hear you. I can't hear you

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I must be REALLY good, right?

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: You won't find a Rudolph that can stand like I do

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No thanks! If I eat another bite I'll explode.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I don't have room for anymore food.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: 是的。。但我还是去到哪里都跟随你~

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 你是什么意思？我向你学的。。。

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 我会向所有人宣布你是一个很糟糕的主人！

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 粉红不再是你最爱的颜色了？*抽泣*。。。

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 这里太吵了，我听不见你的说话。

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 你的心情不好。。但不代表你能当我是你的出气筒！

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 我会开始做瘦身运动。。那你会比较喜欢我吗？

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 我所做的都是为了得到你的注意。皮卡皮卡~~~

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 主人！我到底做错了什么？！！

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 你再不停手的话我就告诉我的妈妈！！

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: 我有更重要得事情要做

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: 不行，没有好听的音乐就不行

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: 我需要抱着我的毛绒才行

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 呃。。。不能再忍了~不好意思。。。

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: 没有我的专用卫生纸就不行

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: 在共工场所？你脑筋有问题吗？

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 什么？你几时没有给我足够得饲料？

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 我不能控制我上厕所得时间。

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 最靠近的粉红厕所在哪里？

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 不是现在，先载入我的待办事项清单吧

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 我不想弄脏这个美丽得地方

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 啊。。。优资高纤纬食物的效果

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: 喔。。。我觉得我的肚子越来越小了。。。

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 如果我说话的话我就平衡不了我自己

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 安静下来，别再让我说话。

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 你不知道达尔利和达尔米都不是真的兔子吗？拍半慢。。。

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 我不想躲在角落闹情绪。

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 你想知道我是怎么得到这条尾巴的吗？

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 你知道为什么我叫品克缤吗。。？其实我看起来更像只老鼠。。。

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 烤豆。。咖啡豆。。果冻豆。。没有一个能恰当的形容我。

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: 我走到累时就在地上翻滚。皮卡 噗~~

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 光说没用。。快开始行动吧！

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 穿上你的鞋子。。你的脚有臭味。。。

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: 有时当我仔细的看着你。。你其实没那么聪明。。

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 我手短。。。不能够同时拍拍我的头之余还摸摸我的肚子。

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 你见到我爸爸，戆豆先生了吗？

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 谁能给洛尼一个奶嘴？他常常吮他的手指。。

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 你觉得我有可能有双下巴吗？

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: 不是，我需要更多的练习。。

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: 我喜欢躺在豪华真皮沙发上。

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: 我不是什么地方都能坐下的!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: 我可以依偎在你身旁吗？

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: 你不坐在我身旁吗？皮卡~~

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: 好，我就一直坐着直到你叫我站起为止。。。皮卡~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: *悃*。。。和你一起我快闷慌了。。Z z z。。

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: 当你在我身边，我觉得很舒服。

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: 有你在身边的感觉很棒。

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 爱。。。？哀。。？算了，我还是坐下来摸摸我的肚子好了

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: 用你的爱包围我吧~皮卡~

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 我对‘我爱你’的喜爱比世上任何一样事情更盛！

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: 我不明白。开始你说讨厌我，现在你说爱我？

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: 别撒谎。。我那脆弱的心是很容易破碎的。

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: 我现在很忙。能迟点再谈吗？

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: 你不会是认为我对你有任何好感吧，是吗？

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 随着时间得流逝，我越来越喜欢你了。。。

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: 当我是唯一喜爱它时就不行吗？

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: 我不是娱乐大众得宠物

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: 你不会被我那酷毙的舞步慑住吗？

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 品克缤街头舞蹈时间~保证你眼花撩乱~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: 非得你给我更多食物不行

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: 来见识我的不停歇超级舞步~

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: 试试继续你的玩笑看看有什么后果。

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: 你不可能和我做这一样可爱。。*鬼脸*

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: 我的口水溅到你满脸都是了吗？

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: 别在公共场合做愚蠢的事情。

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: 好无聊。。我回去镜子里面了。

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: 在你的脸上放个微笑吧。

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: 让我给你看看怎么吓坏一个人。。。

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: 你连一点格调都没有吗？

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: 你能给我更有挑战性的任务吗？

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: 你的腿比我短。你追不上我！

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: 这是我抒发我自己的方法。

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: 和我玩久一点行吗。。拜托。。。

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: 好小孩品克缤喜爱早睡~

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: 晚安，主人。。我 爱。。爱 。 。。Z z z 。

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: 这里太吵令到我无法入睡。。

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: 你看到我的黑眼圈了吗？我失眠了。。。

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: 我不管，今晚我决定不睡觉！！！

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: 如果我踢被得话你能帮我盖上吗？

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: 你能在九月过完之前叫醒我吗？

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: 我不是什么地方都能坐下的!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: 唔。。。感觉好像坐在一朵云上。

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: 当然，我可以也翘起我的二郎腿吗？

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: 我不觉得我们彼此了解对方。。。

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: 我的性格也很有弹性~皮卡皮卡~~~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: 我。。我不能。如果你不抚着我的话，我会往后翻滚的。

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 这个地方令我觉得不大舒服。

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 很不幸运。。我并不能控制你的想法。

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 拍拍我的松弛肚皮。皮卡皮卡！

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 嗯。。你觉得我坐下的时候能动到我的脚指吗？

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: 肚子饱饱，天气好好。。。主人也很好！

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 你有尾巴吗？它能帮助你坐下时不会往后翻。试试看吧。

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: 在你还没有礼貌的说话前都不会。。。

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: 再命令我一句我就叫豆仔咬你！

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 哼。。。你又觉得累了？你好弱！

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: 哼！你想趁我终于坐下轻松的时候拿走我的食物！？

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 我从一个瑜珈师父那学会这个坐姿！

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 豆仔可以要一个鸡腿吗？拜托~~~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 我能在不往后翻的情况下好好的坐着几分钟。

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 终于有机会歇一歇我的短腿了。

string.name: c5
string.value: 不是|糟糕|糟糕的女孩|糟糕的男孩

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: 继续下去的话我会发恶梦~

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: 是黑豆的错，不是品克缤。。。

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: 又一次~~我在不对的时间做对的事。

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: 啊。。。我刚刚那麻痹的尾巴给了我很大的麻烦。

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: 我从这次的错误学习到了。。。对不起。

string.name: c6
string.value: 不是|糟糕|糟糕的女孩|糟糕的男孩

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: 你不想看见品克缤的另外那非常恶劣的一面，对吗？

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: 说多一句我就不再理你。

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: 你的错误随你将它怪在我身上！

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: 很好，是我的错~为什么现在的人都那么聪明？

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: 是，我知道。请别拉我的尾巴

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: 是，我知道。请别拉我的耳朵

string.name: c7
string.value: 不是|糟糕|糟糕的女孩|糟糕的男孩

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: 你是这样对待你的宠物的吗？

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: 我妈妈不认同你的看法。

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: 好吧，我被罚的留级班在几时？

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: 以现在的情况来说已算是好了！

string.name: c8
string.value: 不是|糟糕|糟糕的女孩|糟糕的男孩

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 再也没人喜爱品克缤了。。。呜呜

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 来吧，我懂枫险之旅得玩家都有很好的包容心。

string.value: 拨弄|恶臭|傀儡|我讨厌你

string.name: f2_f
string.value: 我吃不下了。。。我的胃快胀破了。

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 我好喜爱这个！这太美味了~！！！

string.value: 先得吃东西，才拉得出来。

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 你以为我是拉屎的狗吗？

string.value: 我是可爱的小老虎！别冲我大喊大叫！

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: 我做错了什么，要这样教训我？

string.value: 你是想听到我的声音吗～

string.value: 我们之间的对话不够吧？

string.value: 很久很久以前……有一只美男老虎……

string.value: 我爱你|我喜欢你|亲爱的

string.value: 爱是要用行动来表达的，不是嘴上说说就行了的。

string.value: 我爱你|我喜欢你|亲爱的

string.value: 像我这样威猛的老虎，你觉得配得上我吗？

string.value: 抱歉，我已经有喜欢的人了。

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: 我们是天造地设的一对。

string.value: 我爱你|我喜欢你|亲爱的

string.value: 我自己会吃的，别把我当小孩子！

string.value: 给我买点好吃的，再来和我说这种话！

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 我太饿了，再也坚持不下去了。

string.value: 最近你的生活有问题吗？

string.value: I like you very very much! KROWL!

string.value: Don't be lying to me like that~!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.value: I don't like being bored. Let's do something!

string.value: How about leveling up? Need my help?

string.value: That sounds good! I felt like resting anyway~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Yawwwn ... I feel like going to bed.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: It'd be nice to take a nap under the sun.

string.value: No, play with me! Play with me!

string.value: Tell that to a lazy fat pig, not to a tiger like me!

string.name: c20_s1

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Sounds like music to my ear. I needed some rest!

string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...

string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, KROWL...

string.value: I know I'm good at making sad faces, but now's not the time.

string.value: I'm not in a good mood!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Sniff ... I've never felt so sad in my life.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Alright, I'll show you my whole repretoir today!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to know how long I should wait here?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'll just leave my paws out here and wait for ya~

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Arrgh...I don't feel like doing this.

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Okay~ I'll sit here and wait!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I'll just sit here and wait til you come back, master~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, KROWL?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...KROWL...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! KROWL!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! KROWL!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? KROWL...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, though!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like crap...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: c10_f1
